title: [Mistydeep, South of Ravelin]
description: From this vantage point, the island appears silent and brooding, its lofty central rock spire overlooking a dense cluster of trees and plant life.  A thin shroud of fog enfolds the edifice, yet does not extend into the woods below.  Shifting shadows unveil gaping windows and jutting platforms skillfully hewn from the granite.  Details are obscure, but the structure exudes a haunting aura of desolation.  A ghost-white owl perched on a high branch lifts its head with a seeming challenge of, "Whooo!"
paths: Obvious paths: north, southeast, southwest, west, northwest, down
location: the northern reaches of the Mistydeep River
